name: Planning
description:
Instructions

You want to set up ambushes to earn as much money as possible. But you are a perfectionist and don't want to go for it without planning everything.

To implement your plans, you will need to hire specialized personnel:

- The Archer:  shoot arrows from a distance at the target
 - The Assassin:  kills a target in one-shot but sacrifices himself
 - The Lumberjack:  can cut trees to block ways
 - The Beggar:  slows down the target by stealing its coins

** not finished **
 - The Gravedigger :  hides bodies underground for more discretion
 - The Mercenary :  combat the target in melee
**

You will need to spend 1  for each character you want to recruit. Left click on the pawn and left click on the edge of the map to recruit.

When the character is recruited, if we left click on it we prepare it to move, we must then left click on another part of the map. If you right click on it and prepare it to use its action, another right click on an element will launch an action.

You must not be spotted so you will have to hide behind trees or in the bushes to scheming freely.
** not finished **
If only one of the passers-by notices the ambush and manages to leave the map, you will have to go to the next level and check how many coins you have accumulated.
**

**EN**
Game created for Weekly Game Jam # 191 with "Ambush" theme. There is a lot missing in the game but I still wanted to upload it.

**FR**
